spec_data.Name: perl-POD2-Base
spec_data.Description:
This module is an abstraction of the code in POD2::IT and POD2::FR. These
modules belong to the Italian and the French translation projects of core
Perl pods.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 02:44:12 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Base module for translations of Perl documentation
